00014 #ifndef  WINCONFIG_H
00015 #  define   WINCONFIG_H
00016 
00017 #  ifdef    _MSC_VER          // We have Visual C++
00018 #     ifndef   STRICT
00019 #        define   STRICT   1
00020 #     endif
00021 
00022 #     include  <windows.h>
00023 #     include  <wininet.h>
00024 #     include  <vector>
00025 
00026 #     define   SIZEOF_CHAR    1
00027 #     define   SIZEOF_SHORT   2
00028 #     define   SIZEOF_INT     4
00029 #     define   SIZEOF_LONG    4
00030 #     define   SIZEOF_FLOAT   4
00031 #     define   SIZEOF_DOUBLE  8
00032 
00033 #     define   HAVE_IO_H
00034 #     define   HAVE_WINSOCK_H
00035 
00036 #     ifdef    HAVE_IOSTREAM
00037 #        define   HAVE_STRSTREAM
00038 #        define   HAVE_FSTREAM
00039 #     else
00040 #        define   HAVE_STRSTREA
00041 #     endif
00042 
00043 //#     define   HAVE_SYS_TYPES_H

00046 #     define   HAVE_WIN32_THREADS

00048 
00049 // The maxium size of the host name
00050 #ifndef MAXHOSTNAMELEN
00051 #  define MAXHOSTNAMELEN 256
00052 #endif
00053 
00054 // Define PI for windows
00055 #define M_PI   3.141592653589793
00056 #define random() rand()
00057 #define atanh(X) (log((1 + X)/(1 - X))/2)

00059 //#     pragma warning( disable : 4660 )
00060 //#     pragma warning( disable : 4290 )
00061 //#     pragma warning( disable : 4250 )
00062 //#     pragma warning( disable : 4355 )
00063 #        pragma warning( disable : 4786 )
00064 
00065 #     if _MSC_VER <= 1020                 // VC++ 4.2
00066 #        define   SIZEOF_BOOL    0
00067 #        define   HAVE_VCPLUSPLUS_BUGS
00068 #        define   HAVE_NO_MUTABLE
00069 #        define   HAVE_NO_TYPENAME
00070 
00071 #        pragma warning( disable : 4237 )
00072 #     else                                // >= VC++ 5.0
00073 #        define   SIZEOF_BOOL    1
00074 #        define   HAVE_NO_TYPENAME
00075 #        define   HAVE_VCPLUSPLUS_BUGS
00076 
00077 #        ifdef HAVE_IOSTREAM
00078 #           define   HAVE_STD_NAMESPACE
00079 #        endif
00080 #     endif
00081 
00082 #     ifdef _DEBUG
00083          // get a little more help from the mem leak checking of visual.
00084          // The following lines prints the file and line where the allocation was made in addition to the normal
00085          // length of block and first 16 bytes of data.
00086 #        define _CRTDBG_MAP_ALLOC
00087 #        include <stdlib.h>
00088 #        include <malloc.h>
00089 #        include <crtdbg.h>
00090 #     endif
00091 
00092 #else
00093 #pragma message("Unknowm compiler")
00094 #     error    Unknown compiler!
00095 
00096 #  endif    // _MSC_VER
00097
